string.name: name
string.value: Between Human and Yokai
Hmph, it's a clear fact that Yokai cannot coexist with Humans...
I believe that someday Humans and Yokai will get along.
Sooooo.... By that logic, how do you coexist with your sister?

string.name: name
string.value: Damsels and Detectives
What do you want with my sister, old-manbaby?
I'm grateful I have both of you to take care of me.
I'll tolerate that because Takeno is here...

string.name: name
string.value: Stilted Romance
Why is he always bothering Takeno?
I think Nue is just being nice because he's a good person.
Excuse me... Takeno...

string.name: name
string.value: Flowers and Fiends
I don't care what some Yokai thinks.
I hate it when you talk like that...
Everyone has their own tragedy. Get over yourself.

string.name: name
string.value: Bound By Duty
Why are you worrying over some Fox?
I'm happy that Kurama is no longer a hermit.
Are you really sisters? You seem like complete opposites!

string.name: name
string.value: Zipangu Flowers
Isn't Takeno the prettiest in all of Zipangu?
No, no... I think Kino and Izuna are prettier.
Girls, please. Let's not fight over who's prettiest. I don't want to hurt anyone's feelings.

string.name: name
string.value: Great Benefactor
What's Tengu really after?
I wouldn't be here today if it weren't for Tengu's help.

string.name: name
string.value: Bickering Beauties
Takeno doesn't have to listen to some kid like you.
If I was healthy everyone wouldn't have to fuss over me.
After everything, a bunch of Yokai have done more for your sister than you!

string.name: name
string.value: More than Meets the Eye
I can't tell if you're both acting or just really weird.
I'm a man of many mysteries!
I'm not gonna take any guff from you, kid!

string.name: name
string.value: An Unlikely Bunch
Takeno doesn't need any of you when she's got me!
You just keep telling yourself that, buddy.
Even if you're right... I'm not won't give up on her!

string.name: name
string.value: Stubborn By Blood
Even if Humans and Yokai are the same, my behavior was justified.
Don't sweat it. Everybody's got some kinda crippling tragedy.
Tragedy? Ibaraki had a choice, I did not.

string.name: name
string.value: Dumb and Dumber
I don't think you're in a position to be giving advice.
You should be more positive.
Okay! I'll do my best!

string.name: name
string.value: Lunch Buddies
I'm eating with two Yokai instead of my sister? I think I need a minute...
How 'bout now? I'm starving!
We should grab a bite together sometime!

string.name: name
string.value: Silence is Golden
I would not have let Ibaraki stay at the shrine if I knew he'd be this loud.
What? This is my normal speaking voice! If anything, you're talking too quiet.

string.name: name
string.value: Strange Companions
Yokai are so mysterious and hard to understand.
What? Humans are the weird ones!
I think Humans are strange too. Falling for an obvious ploy like Genkou's...
As Yokai go, you two are the worst of the worst.
You're welcome to hate me, but how could you lump me in with a drama-king like that kid?
Pfft. I don't care what some Human thinks.

string.name: name
string.value: The Insufferables
Is the old weasel trying to justify himself?
What? I had no choice!
I will claim my revenge some day.

string.name: name
string.value: Obvious Enemies
I can't tell which of you looks younger.
Wha...? What's wrong with my face?
There's nothing wrong with being young!
Why are you both always asking my sister to do things?
If she didn't want to buy me dango, she would've said something!
Takeno isn't your personal property!
Something strange is going on between you two...
Huh? What are you talking about?

string.name: name
string.value: Embarrassing Secrets
Why do you have the face of a child?
Heh, you're just jealous of my baby-smooth skin.
YOROZU HAS THE NICEST SKIN OF ANYONE!

string.name: name
string.value: Youthful Glow
Kubinashi... Why do you hang out with Nue of all people?
That's because I'm so obviously great! Muhahaha!
...I look to the future, not the present.

string.name: name
string.value: Late Bloomer
You know, you two sort of look alike.
Don't be ridiculous!

string.name: name
string.value: Living in Denial
Why don't you stop bothering my sister and go hang out with that Fox Yokai over there?
Izuna is also pretty but... Ta... Takeno is the only one for me!
HAHAHAHAHAHA! ...Oh sorry, you were serious.

string.name: name
string.value: Stubborn Love
Takeno wouldn't waste her time with either of you!
I'm a far more suitable match than some crow!
Huh? Takeno is like a little sister to me.

string.name: name
string.value: Love Rivals(?)
If you don't stop bugging my sister, I'm going to kick you out of the Mushroom Shrine!
Y-you can't do that! It's destiny!
Your sister isn't going to find ANYBODY with you hovering around all the time.
I think Kubinashi and I might actually get along if I met her before she was a creepy ghost lady.
What do you expect me to do? Travel back in time?
I wouldn't mind a do-over either...

string.name: name
string.value: Ancient History
I don't like how Kubinashi acts towards my sister. And Izuna's way too close!
Someone needs to chill out.
I feel like Tengu's plotting something...
That piercing gaze... It's as though he's reading my thoughts.
W-what? I think you have the wrong idea bout me.

string.name: name
string.value: The Misunderstanding
It's amazing that there are Yokai smarter than Humans...
Hmph. Yorozu cannot match my years of experience.
Clearly quality of study is more important than quantity. YOROZU IS SMARTER THAN YOU!

string.name: name
string.value: Elitist Yokai
I don't really care or anything, but... why aren't you two going out?
Heh... I like Izuna, but she can be a little scary sometimes.
Hmph! I already get enough attention.

string.name: name
string.value: Kooky Kids
I don't have the patience to be nice to any Yokai that isn't my sister.
This place is full of scary people!
I'm not scary.

string.name: name
string.value: Subjective Terror
Why does Kurama smell more like a fox than Izuna?
That's because the of the Nine-Tailed Fox is still inside me.
Yorozu will investigate the source of the Nine-Tailed Fox's power! ...REVEAL YOUR SECRETS!

string.name: name
string.value: Power of the Nine-Tailed Fox
Acting mature isn't proof someone's a good person.
I think Tengu still acts like a kid sometimes.
How do adults act?

string.name: name
string.value: Mature Adult
I guess I can put up with anything as long as Takeno is happy...
I'm just happy that Kura is back in my life.
Yorozu's life is free of hardship as long as she has access to cucumbers and bathes regularly!
Don't you think Yorozu's a little young to be doing all your work for you?
Huh? But I never ask her to do anything...
Mr. Tengu's only flaw is his laziness. It's okay! YOROZU WILL DO IT!

string.name: name
string.value: Brutal Taskmaster
Ibaraki lost Gyuki... Would things be different if I was more self-reliant?
Don't be ridiculous. I miss Gyuki, but what happened to him is no one's fault.
Such a tragedy should never have happened in the first place!
I think both Ibaraki and Nue are good people.
Ugh. Please don't compare me to Nue...
Ibaraki, I challenge you to a duel!

string.name: name
string.value: Dangerous Attention
There's no reason for any of us to fight.
Good luck convincing Kubinashi of that.
Hmph. I don't know whether you are naive, or a fool.

string.name: name
string.value: Difference of Opinion
Kurama and Ibaraki are always so cheerful!
You only get one life, no point wasting time complaining!
I'm the king of positivity!

string.name: name
string.value: Unjustifiably Cheerful
Please don't hate my sister.
Hate her? She's the reason I've made so many friends!
I don't hate her. We were able to help Kurama by gathering the Five Elements.

string.name: name
string.value: Alternative Perspective
I am truly grateful to all those that helped me.
Takeno has a heart of gold.
I merely did what was required of me.
I wish all Yokai could get along with Humans like Ibaraki does.
Give it a few decades! We'll be there sooner than you think.
YOROZU DOES NOT WANT TO HANG OUT WITH SMELLY HUMANS!

string.name: name
string.value: Love for Humanity
I'm grateful to you both for spending so much time looking after me.
It's because you're like a daughter to me.
Get lost, creepy old weasel! Stay away from Takeno!

string.name: name
string.value: Questionable Motive
Kubinashi, I'm really sorry about what happened to you but... Kamaitachi regrets his actions!
I don't know how many times I've apologized!
No amount of apologies will ever be sufficient recourse for taking my life.

string.name: name
string.value: Accidental Murder
Kamaitachi's role as chief investigator is a great help to the Mushroom Shrine.
Heh, I'm a shining example to young Yokai everywhere!
Heh... I'm happy the way I am.

string.name: name
string.value: Chief Investigator Kamaitachi
I enjoy tea time with Izuna.
I like tea! How come I wasn't invited?
I always have time for tea with Takeno.

string.name: name
string.value: Afternoon Tea Time
I'm so thankful that Daidarabotchi sent you both to help me.
Daidarabotchi? I don't take orders from from magic spirit-ladies!
It was fate that brought us together, not Daidarabotchi.

string.name: name
string.value: Daidarabotchi's Will
I think Yorozu would be even cuter if she dressed more like a child.
I think Yorozu's personality is what makes her so cute.
YOROZU DOES NOT WANY ANY MORE ATTENTION!

string.name: name
string.value: Room for Improvement
I think Kubinashi and Nue look like a family.
Takeno Konoko... will you be my family?
Nue, stop being silly.
My sister is my family. I don't know what I'd do without her.
I have Kubinashi!
I have Izuna!

string.name: name
string.value: Never Alone
Nue is so kind. Why don't the three of us have tea next time?
I'm only kind to you, Takeno.
Takeno is oblivious... Nue should just give up.

string.name: name
string.value: Nue's Kindness
Nue and Tengu are always there for me.
You! Why are you hanging around Takeno?
I think there's been a misunderstanding...

string.name: name
string.value: Love Triangle (?)
Do I really look like an old lady?
Takeno Konoko is p... pretty... don't listen to her words. She's just blinded by jealousy.
ANY LADY OLDER THAN YOROZU IS AN OLD LADY!

string.name: name
string.value: Age is a Number
Kura, are you still afraid of the Nine-Tailed Fox's power?
It's natural to be afraid of power stronger than you. There's no need to be ashamed.
The Nine-Tailed Fox is still part of me, but I'm not afraid anymore. Hehe.

string.name: name
string.value: A New Leaf
Brawns' food is delicious.
One of the things I miss most about being alive is hot food.
I prefer a hot glass of tea myself.

string.name: name
string.value: Hot Food
Tengu, what kind of person were you in the past? Where did you come from?
Some questions are best unanswered.
I committed many sins in my former life.

string.name: name
string.value: Shadow of a Dark Past
Yorozu, I heard you studied in Showa. Is that why you're so smart?
Is Showa known for its education programs?
Yorozu learned a lot in Showa! It's way more advanced than here!

string.name: name
string.value: Yorozu, Student from Showa
Back when I lived in the village, Izuna would visit me from time to time.
Is that where Izuna went at night?
I'm not like Kura, I feel cooped up spending all my time on Fox Mountain.

string.name: name
string.value: Izuna's Night in Town
Tengu... you always protect me without a complaint!
When I'm older I want to be like Tengu!
I'm not that mature...

string.name: name
string.value: Better with Age
It's hard for me to feel bad about Genkou.
Ugh... And what he did to those monks...
I wouldn't be who I am today if it wasn't for Genkou's cruelty.
You know, I don't think I've ever seen Tengu laugh.
Tengu's laughter... even I'm curious what that sounds like.
Not everyone laughs.

string.name: name
string.value: A Crow's Laughter
Are all Kappas rude?
ARE YOU CALLING ME OLD?! How dare you! I'm not even married yet...
Yorozu doesn't want to be like you when she grows up!

string.name: name
string.value: Age Before Beauty
Tengu, I'm grateful for all your help.
I did no more than anyone else.
You should thank Yorozu too!

string.name: name
string.value: Thanks To
Somebody said Kamaitachi's scythe is made from Moonstones... Is it true?
Huh? Where did you hear that rumor?
... (I definitely heard Yorozu say something like that...)

string.name: name
string.value: News Travels Fast
I'm sure Kamaitachi and Kubinashi will be able to set aside their grudge someday.
It's gonna be hard while she's trying to kill me...
I won't give up until my enemy is dead.

string.name: name
string.value: The Immortal Grudge
Hey Kurama, show us the Nine-Tailed Fox!
How about a duel? My scythe against your Nine-Tailed Fox?
I'm not going to awaken the Nine-Tailed Fox for your amusement!

string.name: name
string.value: Curiosity Kills
It's hard to find a beauty like Izuna, even in the Human world.
Wait... Are you saying some Human girls are even prettier? I'm just asking out of curiosity...
Hahaha. I was once crowned 'Miss Fox Mountain,' and I didn't even enter the contest!

string.name: name
string.value: Miss Fox Mountain
Kamaitachi, what's up with Tengu staring at you all the time?
What? Is Tengu out to get me like Kubinashi?
You misinterpret my look.

string.name: name
string.value: A Significant Look
Y'know, I think that between the two of you, Yorozu actually looks younger.
Hahaha! You'd better stop before you make her mad.
YOROZU WILL NOT BE ASHAMED OF HER YOUTHFUL APPEARANCE!

string.name: name
string.value: Yorozu and Kamaitachi
Hey, Nue I'm sorry you blew it with Takeno. Even if it was hilarious.
Ibaraki! You have to help me from now on.
Nue, this is no time for childish crushes.

string.name: name
string.value: The (Immature) Young Master
I'm the smartest one here.
Don't be silly. There's no one that can beat my dazzling intellect.
Huh? Don't look at me...

string.name: name
string.value: 3 Idiot
Nue, what do you think of Izuna?
Izuna's beauty makes her a suitable match for someone like me.
Sorry Nue, you're not my type.
It seems Nue thinks Tengu is his rival...
I won't forgive you if you keep hanging around Takeno!
This is all a misunderstanding.

string.name: name
string.value: Selective Hearing
There are always a few bad apples, but most Humans are good.
You two are so nice to Humans. It's weird.
Any Human is better than a cannibalistic Yokai! That's what Yorozu thinks.

string.name: name
string.value: Fans of Humanity
Hey Kubinashi, do you wear that scarf because it matches your clothes?
This ribbon is dyed red with my own blood, a symbol of the revenge that is to come.
Huh? Didn't Nue say it was to cover the wound on your neck...?

string.name: name
string.value: Secret Of the Scarf
That hardest thing to do while pretending to be a Human is eating... Oh! But that delicious soda pop.
I haven't been able to taste anything since I died.... Kamaitachi! You will pay for this!
...I like cherries.

string.name: name
string.value: Same Bed, Different Dreams
Tengu's solemn attitude is a little spooky.
Isn't it better than being hopelessly sunny all the time?
Light and dark exist to give balance to one another.

string.name: name
string.value: Light and Darkness
(Sighs) It's hard living as a Human.
I would happily rejoin their ranks, had I the choice.
I liked the time I spent in Showa Town.

string.name: name
string.value: Living with Humans
Seeing Kurama and Izuna together reminds me of my friendship with Gyuki.
Izuna is more important to me than family. We grew up together.
...Kura is precious to me too.

string.name: name
string.value: Childhood Friends
(Whisper, whisper)
(Whisper, whisper)
You two are beginning to resemble one another.

string.name: name
string.value: Instant Friends
If Yorozu is going to act like a child, she should hang out with other kids.
She's really smart for her age.
YOROZU IS NOT A CHILD!

string.name: name
string.value: Elegant Lady
Nice girls like Izuna should be careful around people like Tengu.
I'm always careful about everything.
I see you're the source of the rumors...
Haha, I wouldn't mind having a little sister like Yorozu, if she were a little sweeter.
You can't talk about sweetness and leave me out.
Hmph. Being sweet is just a ruse to hide one's flaws.

string.name: name
string.value: Sweet Izuna
Don't look at me like that, pal.
You seem to be acting as though you've done something wrong...
WHAT ARE YOU UP TO, SPIKEY HEAD?

string.name: name
string.value: Guilty Conscience
You're not going to start another cult up, are you Nue?
I refuse to relive the humiliation of that day, but one day I will resume preaching the TRUE gospel of Nue.
I'd rather you didn't bring it up...

string.name: name
string.value: One Step Forward
What's up with this generation? An angsty young narcissist, and an antisocial hermit...
I'm not angsty!
Huh? Are you talking about me?

string.name: name
string.value: Kids These Days
There ought to be more girls out there like Izuna.
You old pervert... Are women all you think about?
Nue... you realize you spend half your time following Takeno around, right?
Ugh, my head hurts.
One day, I'll rule Zipangu... and then the world!
Take deep breaths, Kamaitachi. In, and out...

string.name: name
string.value: Long-term Goals
Listen kid, if we're taking bets, my money's on Yorozu.
How dare you ignore me... You'll regret it when I conquer the world!
YOROZU WILL BE A KIND AND REASONABLE LEADER, AND SHE WILL RULE WITH AN IRON FIST.

string.name: name
string.value: Plans for World Domination
I thought we had a truce?
I agreed to no such thing!
Kubinashi, calm down! Revenge won't get you anywhere.

string.name: name
string.value: Renewing the Ceasefire
I'm sorry, Izuna, but there's somebody else... Kubinashi and I...
W-what? Enough of your pranks, weasel.
What are you talkin about? I don't understand what's happening right now...

string.name: name
string.value: Strange Secrets
I'm sorry! I'm sorry!
I won't accept an apology that's not from the heart.
This isn't a bad look on you, Kamaitachi.

string.name: name
string.value: Natural Enemies
Hey, Yorozu. Can you talk some sense into Kubinashi?
You think I'll listen if she tries to stop me?
Oh no, I think getting revenge is the right call.

string.name: name
string.value: Unexpected Allies
Hey, is it true you proposed to Izuna?
Eek! Who said that? That's something that happened when we were kids...
Hmph, I don't care even if he proposes 100 times.

string.name: name
string.value: Sleeping Dogs
I'm way better than Tengu!
Umm, I want to be like Tengu.
I am already Tengu. There is no need for another...

string.name: name
string.value: Tengu and Kamaitachi
Yorozu is adorable.
She is cute with those glasses...
LEAVE YOROZU ALONE!

string.name: name
string.value: Yorozu - Mushroom Shrine's Idol
You kids make such a cute couple. Best of luck to you both!
(Blushes) Tengu and me? Ha-ha-ha-ha! Don't be s-silly...
I'm afraid there's... someone else.

string.name: name
string.value: Tactless Matchmaker
Hey, it's two of my favorite people!
Hah. You never change, Kamaitachi.
GO AWAY OLD MAN.

string.name: name
string.value: Kamaitachi's Happy Place
My keen insight and investigative skills can't be beat!
I will not engage in pointless contests... Besides, my skills are clearly superior.
You're both being ridiculous. YOROZU DOES ALL THE LEGWORK!

string.name: name
string.value: Investigative Prowess
Kurama! You must have seen my greatness! You should join my order!
Ahem. Nue be praised.
I... um... I have to go now.

string.name: name
string.value: Old Habits
I will fight every day until I win Takeno's love!
There is no greater challenge than being in love with someone oblivious.
I never realized Kurama felt that way about me... Huh? What were we talking about?

string.name: name
string.value: Hopeless Romantics
I must keep Tengu away from Takeno!
When will Nue return to his old self?
I do not believe his condition will simply resolve itself...

string.name: name
string.value: Believe What You Want
Kubinashi is a better advisor than some kid could hope to be...
Of course, I have many years of experience...
YOROZU SAYS AGE IS JUST A CONSTRUCT!

string.name: name
string.value: Just a Number
Takeno has not returned my feeling yet, but love is a flame that must be kindled!
The first time my heart fluttered for Izuna was under the cherry tree.
I guess women sometimes like those who like them...

string.name: name
string.value: Love is Fickle
Tengu has nothing on me!
Yeah! Even though he's taller, and more handsome, and has a voice like butter...
There is no need for comparisons. We each have our own merits. Besides, you cannot compare two things with such stark differences...

string.name: name
string.value: Clear Differences
W-what? How could you put me on the same level as Kurama?
Heheh. I don't mind being compared to Nue.
Don't you both have the same IQ?

string.name: name
string.value: Double Digit IQ
H-huh? A secret about Takeno that I don't know?
I know Takeno Konoko's secret. Hehe.
Izuna, please. We should not make Nue feel bad.

string.name: name
string.value: Takeno's Secret
Having tea with Takeno Konoko... I'm so jealous...
Hey Yorozu, want to join us for tea?
Yorozu has more important things to do with her time. Like science!

string.name: name
string.value: Tea Invitation
Tengu must be lazy to make Yorozu do everything for him.
An odd thing to say, for someone who preyed upon the fears of the dead.
YOROZU ONLY DOES WHAT YOROZU WANTS!

string.name: name
string.value: Lazy or Eager?
I'm curious... does Kurama still like Izuna?
Err... I don't want to talk about something so embarrassing...
Would things have been different if I knew how he felt before?

string.name: name
string.value: Opportunities Lost & Found
I wish Nue would stop following Takeno Konoko around.
Heh... Why don't you just tell Nue that?
I've tried but Nue is persistent.

string.name: name
string.value: Stubborn Love
Why is a smart child like Yorozu running errands for Tengu?
Those two make me feel like the dumbest person in Zipangu...
Why is a smart lady like Kubinashi working for Nue?

string.name: name
string.value: Personal Reasons
Life favors the strong. Fight hard, or you will be doomed to suffer.
...You're both real downers.
I have found the same to be true at times...

string.name: name
string.value: Optimism vs. Pessimism
Consuming a warm drink feels good, even if I can't taste it.
Tea is a great way to relax!
Tea is like drinking bathtime. YOROZU IS IN HEAVEN!

string.name: name
string.value: Relaxing Cup of Tea
Your relationship with each other is different than the one I have with Nue.
Yorozu is not a child of my blood, but rather my sin.
Papa Tengu has always been there for Yorozu! Even if he's a little lazy...

string.name: name
string.value: Parental Figures
I feel like I'm so behind in life when I see Tengu. You're so put-together!
Kura is so childish.
Hmm? Oh, hello. When did you both get here?

string.name: name
string.value: Adulthood is Subjective
I was in the top of my class when I was a kid!
You were on top because everyone else was off playing...
Certainly there are smarter people among the Fox Yokai...

string.name: name
string.value: Debatable Accomplishments
Ugh... I feel like a zoo animal.
Is something supposed to happen?
QUIET! Yorozu is studying the power of the Nine-Tailed Fox.

string.name: name
string.value: Captive Research
T-Tengu. Why don't you have tea with us sometime?
Will Takeno be there? I would be more than happy to come.
...Does Izuna have a thing for Mr. Tengu?

string.name: name
string.value: Transparent Motives
